speaker: Agent
text: Hello and thank you for contacting General Corporation. Before we start may I have your first and last name?

speaker: Client
text: David Firth

speaker: Agent
text: And what is your account number mister Firth?

speaker: Client
text: It's one two four nine eight seven four six two three I think.

speaker: Agent
text: And your social security number?

speaker: Client
text: It's two three four two three two three four three.

speaker: Agent
text: And what is your email address?

speaker: Client
text: It's eisen@discourse.ai

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you David. How may I help you today?

speaker: Client
text: I'm trying to pay my bill but it's not working.

speaker: Agent
text: Ok is this the first time you've tried to make the payment?

speaker: Client
text: yes

speaker: Agent
text: Ok I can help you with that. Are you trying to pay with a bank draft or a credit card?

speaker: Client
text: I'm paying with my debit card.

speaker: Agent
text: What amount are you trying to pay?

speaker: Client
text: Five hundred dollars and fourty three cents

speaker: Agent
text: What is the name of the bank for your debit card?

speaker: Client
text: Sorry I meant five hundred even. My bank is Wells Fargo.

speaker: Agent
text: Can you please confirm the debit card number for me please?

speaker: Client
text: It's four oh one two zero zero zero zero nine eight seven six five four three nine

speaker: Agent
text: and the expiration?

speaker: Client
text: July of two thousand twenty three

speaker: Agent
text: And the CV code?

speaker: Client
text: What is that?

speaker: Agent
text: It's a three digit number usually on the back of your debit card next to the signature strip.

speaker: Client
text: Oh ok. It's <CVV/> or four one two

speaker: Agent
text: When did you want the payment to process?

speaker: Client
text: Can you make the payment process tomorrow please?

speaker: Agent
text: Do I have your authorization to run your debit card in the amount of five hundred dollars?

speaker: Client
text: Yes.

speaker: Agent
text: Ok one moment please while I run your debit card.

speaker: Client
text: Ok

speaker: Agent
text: The system is telling me that it needs your physical address associated with the card.

speaker: Client
text: Ok. It's four one three main street in Deluth Georgia in the United States. The zip is five five eight one two or <ZIP/>.

speaker: Agent
text: I also need a phone number associated with the account.

speaker: Client
text: It’s probably my cell phone. That's two one eight seven three oh four three oh oh. It could also be my land line which is five nine one, two six eight, five five nine one.

speaker: Agent
text: And what is your four digit PIN code?

speaker: Client
text: I believe it's <PIN/>. Or it could be one one six eight

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. I will try running the transaction again.

speaker: Client
text: Ok thanks.

speaker: Agent
text: The payment was successful. You should get an email confirmation that a payment in the amount of five hundred dollars was made on August eleventh at eleven fifty nine AM. Is there anything else I can help you with?

speaker: Client
text: And you're one hundred percent sure it went through?

speaker: Agent
text: Yes the payment was successful.

speaker: Client
text: Nope that's it.
